content:
What is the status of this?
http://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=5779&start=0

Issues like this should be in the dotnet client GitHub issues tracker. However this can be closed anyway as the Operation() ,ethod has an optional parameter to indicate if a GET or POST should be used.
I'll update the tracker including the reference and close it.
thx, we're closing down that category in gForge
